page.title: 03 CURRENT TIMES
page.content: I live in a detatched, renovated croft house which was completed in 1985.The steading has been converted to a double garage and our drive has been evenly tarmacademed.We have oil fired central heating,while our neighbours use calor gas,there being no natural gas.My mum often uses the microwave to cook our meals,which she takes from the freezer.The winter goes on for almost six months so my dad bought my mum an automatic washing machine and tumble dryer,because he works on the rigs now.We have a log burner too because we get lots of strong wind and snow which makes the electricity go off.Last winter we had no power for 13 days!I don't like it then because I can't play on the computer or watch Ghostbusters on the video or go to the Disco in the Village Hall.
